snippet: Rather than risk thousands of miles in excessive air travel, the San Francisco Giants, awaiting the identity of their opponent, chose to spend another night in Cincinnati.
lead_paragraph: Rather than risk thousands of miles in excessive air travel, the San Francisco Giants, awaiting the identity of their opponent, chose to spend another night in Cincinnati.

headline.seo: Giants Stay in Cincinnati and Wait For Which Way to Fly
headline.main: Giants Stay and Wait for Which Way to Fly
headline.print_headline: Giants Stay and Wait For Which Way to Fly
